FuncDef: The display service update-fail-record statistics command displays statistics about EDSG service update failures.
Examples: Failed to apply SQ resource for the service                 1023
Failed to apply CAR resource for the service                  1
Failed to apply statistic resource for the service           20
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view statistics about EDSG service update failures, run the display service update-fail-record statistics command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
